title: Tenth Line
description: Given a text file file.txt, print just the 10th line of the file. Example: Assume that file.txt has the following content: Line 1 Line 2 Line 3 Line 4 Line 5 Line 6 Line 7 Line 8 Line 9 Line 10 Your script should output the tenth line, which is: Line 10 Note: 1. If the file contains less than 10 lines, what should you output? 2. There's at least three different solutions. Try to explore all possibilities.
